entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Make Decimal constructor decimal.ToDecimal(ReadOnlySpan<byte> span) public #66171
  • Bad Process.StartTime in .NET Core 3.1 on macOS #66170
  • Mono is crashing on the newly added tests for generic Attributes #66168
  • [API Proposal]: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #66167
  • [wasm] Use a fixed version of `v8` for testing #66164
  • Fatal CLR error when XML serializing ImmutableArray, related to reflection #66163
  • JIT: checked/release asm diff in windows and linux x64 #66155
    7.0.0
  • SDL signoff requirements - please enable additional C/C++ compiler warnings #66154
  • Consider updating ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory to use ILEmit when possible #66153
  • Unable to resolve service for type 'MyApp.Data.MyDBContext' while attempting to activate 'MyApp.Services.MyService'.at Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.ServiceLookup.CallSiteFactory.CreateArgumentCallSites #66148
  • ConfigurationBinder fails to set values for properties of a type with ISet<T> variations #66141
  • [Feature]: StartupHook dependency resolving #66138
  • HttpClient throws exception with message "The proxy tunnel request to proxy 'xxx' failed with status code '407'."'" instead of returning a response with ProxyAuthenticationRequired #66133
  • [API Proposal]: Add ServiceCollection.MakeReadOnly() #66126
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/VT/callconv/jumper5_il_r/jumper5_il_r.sh #66123
    7.0.0

Closed

  • SSE Instructions for `System.Math` and `System.MathF` classes #66104
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String and others #65717
  • Regressions in System.Tests Perf_Random/Perf_String #65718
  • Performance cliff with StringBuilder.Append(AppendInterpolatedStringHandler) #65788
  • [API Proposal]: Add more granular Interfaces to System.INumber<T> #65807
  • Tests.proj doesn't filter to best TargetFramework when running Test target #66122
  • Building CoreCLR tests fails #65205
  • Add ability to send SslCertificateTrust in TLS handshake on Linux and macOS #55802
    7.0.0
  • ChangingMarshallingAttributes_SameStrategy_DoesNotRegenerate test is failing in CI on Unix #66143
  • Test failure:System.MemoryTests.MemoryTests.MemoryManagerPinLargeArray #33943
    7.0.0
  • [Question] MemoryStream Dispose() behavior #66136
  • Access violation executing location when closing an application that hosts the .NET 5.0 Runtime via CoreCLRHost #62346
  • Eliminate for loop in `UnicastIPAddressInformation`.`PrefixLengthToSubnetMask` #65732
  • Could not load type 'System.Runtime.CompilerServices.Unsafe' from assembly 'System.Runtime, Version=7.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a'. #66056
  • [mono] Crash/fail-fast if the ICU data file fails to load or fails to decompress #66030
    7.0.0
  • mark SslProtocols.Tls and SslProtocols.Tls11 as obsolete #65546
    7.0.0
  • Recent NativeAOT produce warnings about invalid format of DLL #65613
  • Createdump can not generate dump file when the service in a container restarts. #66074
    7.0.0
  • CI failures in "Libraries Test Run release coreclr windows x86 Release" #66125
  • ZipArchive corrupts files with unicode characters #65750
    7.0.0
  • Test build failure: The type 'EventPipeProvider' is defined in an assembly that is not referenced #66099
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_fgBBcount == m_compiler->fgBBcount' during 'Profile instrumentation' #65992
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ReadStack.JsonTypeInfo derivation logic consistent with WriteStack's #66169
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Update Traversal msbuild SDK #66165
  • Fix catching of generic exception in crossgened shared generic code #66162
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Spill low ref count vector that has lot of save/restore #66161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update files to remove imhameed #66160
    area-Meta
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add ios-arm64 logic to create .ipa for perf runs #66159
  • Don't add TestLibrary as a reference to all runtime tests #66157
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fixes #66141: ConfigurationBinder and ISet #66151
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Improve ICU missing msg for Alpine #66150
    area-System.Globalization
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix clash between tentative method optimizations #66145
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use RegexGenerator in System.Private.Xml #66142
    area-System.Xml
  • Allow marshalling IL_STUB compilation for ndirect methods using crossgen2 if SPC.dll is in the same bubble #66139
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address feedback on fabricbot config for area pods #66137
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • Count `OBJ/BLK` as memory uses #66135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • change the region related config names to be more reasonable #66134
    area-GC-coreclr
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fixes Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390 #66131
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1643830 #66130
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Initial lookbehind support for RegexCompiler / source generator #66127
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • JIT: handle large OSR funclet frame initial SP delta for arm64 type 5… #66124
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix copy propagation #66070
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a unique EventId for Verbose in NetEventSource.Common #66158
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • attempt to fix up EnterpriseTests #65981
    area-System.Net
  • Run trim analyzer #65870
  • Remove leftover runtextbeg/end references from RegexCompiler / source generator #66129
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Update branding to 5.0.16 #66020
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.4 #66021
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • remove MemoryManagerPinLargeArray test as it tests something that we don't ship #66152
    area-System.Memory
  • avoid unnecessary base.Dispose call, as the base implementation does nothing #66140
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix test failure due to conflicting merged PRs in DllImportGenerator tests. #66156
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add a comment in source-generated regexes explaining why they cannot have optimized code. #66114
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Fix handling of atomic nodes in RegexCompiler / source generator #66046
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix an assert in the local register allocator. #66054
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [monoapi] Add mono_method_get_unmanaged_callers_only_ftnptr #66007
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Host test error format #65730
    area-Host
  • Mark SslProtocols.Tls and SslProtocols.Tls11 as obsolete #65773
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [iOS] Fix return code when failing to load ICU data #66055
    area-System.Globalization
  • Mark ImageAnimator.UpdateFrames to accept a nullable Image #65949
    area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0
  • Add support for static virtual methods #66084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix `mcs -merge` to stop printing an error message on success #66128
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Disable default marshalling for bool #65749
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix marshalling issue with BerVal #66119
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Update RegexGenerator to require LangVersion > 10 #66111
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix ZipArchiveEntry names shown as corrupted on other zip programs #65886
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [tests] Update eventsvalidation tests to use intree Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client #66110
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • JIT: tolerate schema mismatches in partial compilation with pgo #66105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: add hash and tiering name to assert message #66107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update Roslyn and use new step tracking API in incremental tests. #63978
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Bump sdk for workload testing to `7.0.100-preview.3.22151.18` #65003
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Update the StubManager for better debugger stepping. #65947
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Skip Upper vector save/restore for blocks that THROW #66109
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Build a new version of System.Runtime.Experimental with the correct assembly version #65733
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 6.0.4
  • retire DummyTcpServer from SslStream tests #65876
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix performance regression in SSL handshake #66077
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix NonBacktracking quadratic behavior with deep loops #66038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add support for Windows IO completions to the portable thread pool #64834
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Release/6.0] Backport of Mariner 2.0 and Linux Arm64 packaging work #65979
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.4
  • Add a target to force packages which reference serviced packages to also be serviced #66106
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Extend Equals/StartsWith auto-vectorization for OrdinalIgnoreCase #66095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsics for Vector64/128 "All" and "Any" variants of GT/GE/LT/LE #65889
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Move Array.CreateInstance methods to shared CoreLib #66025
  • Some more clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #66018
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Rename `DllImportGenerator` project to `LibraryImportGenerator` #66029
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add HostApplicationBuilder #65109
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Annotating Native CoreLib library to be AOT friendly #66112
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][llvm] Fix crashes when methods fail LLVM compilation. #65391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Convert* for Vector{64, 128} on ARM64 #65946
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Only register composite R2R native image code range once #65623
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Release/6.0] Backporting recent fixes related to AVX and suspension. #66120
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.4
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix issues related to JsonSerializerOptions mutation and caching. #65863
    area-System.Text.Json, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Adding Count(ReadOnlySpan<char>) Overloads #66026
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating native traces from JS, using a symbols file #66042
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Reimplement stubs to improve performance #65738
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [tests] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    area-Interop-mono
  • Decommit region tails #66008
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion property for package references #65614
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • Get rid of fallback to process ids enumeration in ProcessManager.IsProcessRunning (Windows) #65041
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Condition Windows SslCertificateTrust test on Registry value #65848
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix DebuggerDisplay for serializer types #65971
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Android 32 to RID graph #66022
    area-Meta
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make sure that StressLogAnalyzer works with filtering 64 bit addresses #64594
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 and 9 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question] V00 throwing out LLVM Arg info calculation #1858

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial support for OperIsLocalAddr #1758

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Users can build and publish container images for their applications without a Docker Engine #24216
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet sdk problem with running Azure Function project in Mac M1 in Rider #24215
  • Support flowing workload dependencies through project and package dependencies #24205
    6.0.3xx
  • Make dotnet list package work without restore when using lock files #24194
  • Make dotnet list package --vulnerable take the target framework into account #24193
  • Reenable DotnetNewCommandFirstArgumentShouldBeSentToTelemetryWithPerformanceData #24190

Closed

  • "dotnet test --blame-crash" swallows first test assembly #20241
  • [Feature] Add an option to build cross-platform wrapper startup executables #12700
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24214
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clarify NuGet version conflicts #24209
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Reapply fsharpcore update #24212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.407 #24155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Temporarily disable test that's failing 10% #24191
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Blame switch args should not swallow following arg #23722
    Area-DotNet Test
  • reenable composite r2r singlefile test on OSX #23934
    Area-SingleFile

Updated

  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24168
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Draft: detect if a particular execution of the SDK is on a CI system or not #24166
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1643737 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update 6.0.3xx with the 6.0.200 version of files #23977
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Workload update timer #24104
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix cli translation issue in Strings.zh-Hans.xlf #23882
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Introduce an operator like TypeScript's Omit utility type. #5861

Updated

  • Definite Assignment in Struct Constructors #5737
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • Enum extensions #3491

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update checked-user-defined-operators.md based on decisions made at LDM-2022-02-23 #5864

Updated

  • Update pattern-variables.md #5781

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make IMoveStaticMembersOptionsService available for VSMac #59936
    17.2
  • Refactoring is incorrect for dynamic types #59934
  • Edit Window Washed Out Unusable #59933
  • SyntaxContexts IsGlobalStatementContext should take file scoped namespaces into consideration #59931
    17.3
  • Add "Change namespace to match directory structure" refactoring that takes target namespace as input #59929
  • An easier way to execute 'Wrap every parameter -> Indent all parameters' #59927
  • indent guidelines Missing on C # #59926
  • Show exception description in C# XML documentation #59925
  • Automatically inserting code #59924
  • "Power" Member Rename to update Constructors and other References #59923
  • Remove implicit usings from newly generated classes #59922
  • Auto Formatting Column Mode #59921
  • Show generic collections in IntelliSense #59920
  • Remove out of context suggestions from IntelliSense #59919
  • Add "Inspect value destination" #59917
  • Reorder Intellisense method list based on method type (instance vs. extension) #59915
  • Typing a semicolon should move the cursor to the end of the statement #59913
  • Escape analysis inconsistency (CS8353) #59908
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException from SymbolFinder while using "change namespace to match folder structure" refactoring #59901
  • "Change namespace to match directory structure" refactoring issues #59899

Closed

  • The name of the generated event handler is invalid for generics classes. #59935
  • Use Pattern Matching Code Fix produces logically wrong results #59932
  • O/I icon should show base/derived classes/method in a tree #59918
  • Automatically wrap a long line upon hitting a semicolon #59911
  • Add angle-brackets automatically for generic arguments #59914
  • Simplify "View Call Hierarchy" #59916
  • KeyNotFoundException from Pythia.AbstractPythiaCompletionProvider.GetTextChangeAsync #59895

PullRequests

Created

  • Capability tracking #59938
    Area-Interactive
  • Require a matching regular operator for a checked operator #59937
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Source generators/fix exception latching #59930
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Avoid deadlock while loading ExtensionManagerPackage for integration tests #59910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Correct indentation for action values (sub-items) #59909
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Editor namespaces refactoring - part 1 #59907
    Area-IDE
  • Break out embedded language classification (MEF side) #59905
    Area-IDE
  • Dev/rigibson/dogfood pnc #59904
    Area-Compilers
  • Update CodeStyle/format/SDK versions #59903
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Allow generate ctor intent to specify accessibility #59730
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.2.P2
  • Create attribute default arguments during binding #59750
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Bind declarations of checked conversion operators #59740
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Add quotes in string for clarity #59928
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Try to get dumps for VS hanging during initialization #59902
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • If we delete dump files, log as such #59906
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Simplify the simplification code. #59864
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59893
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Notify docs team for new breaking change documentation" #59900
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Remove unnecessary conditional logic from FlowAnalysisPass #59892
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59898
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59940
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59939
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE
  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE
  • Filter to exact test class names in RunTests #59752
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix handling for source generated documents in LSIF #59891
    Area-IDE
  • Exclude object's methods from ref struct completion list #59884
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
  • Additional tests for pattern matching on `Span<char>` #59876
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix pattern based arguments in ForEachLoopOperationInfo without binding assumptions #59887
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Break out embedded language classification entirely from normal classification #59896
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add new feature to fix invalid constraints. #59889
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Push the two-step navigation system further through roslyn. #59802
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Codeaction diagnostics #59787
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor app breaks on Chrome Mobile #40528
  • Hot Reload is broken! VS 2022 17.1.0 #40527
    7.0-preview3
  • SDL signoff requirements - please enable additional C/C++ compiler warnings #40525
  • Build fails if Blazor Parameter namespace matches a nested namespace #40524
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute with UseStaticFiles results in wrong status code (200 OK) #40518
  • Connection fails on android (react-native) #40517
  • Update `RouteHandlerFilterContext.Parameters` API #40514
    7.0-preview3
  • Add support for filter factory to minimal APIs #40513
    7.0-preview3

Closed

  • Investigate not requiring unintuitive requirements for pre-rendering PageTitle #38400
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Consider adding support for `TryParse` as a way to bind primitives #39682
    7.0-preview3
  • Skip authentication on specific razor pages (.razor) #40375
  • Allowing to use a separate closing tag in the ComponentTagHelper #40520
  • Incorrect LoginPath redirection for cookie authentication #40516
  • Allow using BindProperty when using FromBody or ApiController attributes #40449
  • Minimal APIs: Moving handler with single parameter of type `HttpContext` to separate method results in empty response #39956
    7.0-preview3
  • Friendly blazor for webpack #40343

PullRequests

Created

  • Restore use of ParameterDefaultValue in ActivatorUtilities #40529
  • Added onmouseleave and onmouseenter events. #40519
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • feat (MVC) : Add EmptyResult property to `ControllerBase` #40515
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/5.0] Update Selenium versions #40511
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x

Merged

  • Revert "Activate components by default" #40526
    7.0-preview3
  • Modify HtmlRenderer to update content when a component re-renders #40512
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • New TryParseModelBinder #40233
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • return value for single HttpContext parameter #40235
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Ensure error boundary service is registered as part of call to AddBlazorWebView #40508
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.4
  • Add support for endpoint filters in minimal APIs #40491
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add/Modify Url Encoding/Decoding for IIS UrlRewrite #40483
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add analyzer to detect async void usage #40165
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Default to 3 local retries #40503
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Working ANCM arm64 installers #39523
    area-runtime
  • Partition some pools by core #40476
    Perf, area-runtime
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Input components two way binding #40234
    area-blazor, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add gRPC JSON transcoding #40242
    area-grpc
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4517697` to `c9461a9` #40467
    area-infrastructure, 5.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DynamicResource binding not working #5044
  • Enable trimmer analysis and add baselines for warnings #5041
  • Picker on Windows Doesn't Update Display When Item is Selected #5038
  • Support for launchSettings.json across all Maui targets #5037
  • [Bug] Gif image not working in MAUI #5034
  • NavigationPage.SetTitleView does not work in Android and Windows #5032
  • NavigationPage.ToolbarItems not shown on Android and Windows #5031

Closed

  • Multiple Microsoft.Maui.*.dll's map same type name to the same xmlns #4720
  • SearchBar Keyboard #2090
  • Mac Catalyst Blazor WebView CMD+SHIFT+I doesn't open dev tools #5022
  • FormattedText: Span BackgroundColor does not work #4788
  • Span Text cannot be changed #4765
  • [Bug] Element not found exception while invoking RequestAsync() method on Share (Maui Essentials) #1672
  • [Bug] [Mac Catalyst] Device.RuntimePlatform is set to Device.iOS #2675
  • ListView not displayed on Android since updating on prev. 11 #4007
  • WPF Blazor Rendering Runtime Error Plus Hidden Bug #1244
  • [Windows] Button changes TextColor on hover and never restores it back #4887

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Routing with a Fully Qualified Type name #5045
  • [GH-4958] Platform behavior implementation #5043
  • [Android] Correctly render shadow navigating back #5035
    platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, high
  • Make Maui.Core, Controls.Core, and Controls.Xaml Trimmable #5028
    area/app-size 🤏

Merged

  • [Android] Changes to avoid an EditText issue with RecyclerView scroll #5003
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • iOS WrapperView overlay should not accept touches #5030
  • Remove unsupported targets in Device class #4491
    area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • Backport p14 changes #5040
  • Remove all usage of Device throughout the repo #4982
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Remove unused ExportFontAttribute.EmbeddedFontResourceId property #5010
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Use TextHighlighter to implement background color for Span #5025
  • Implement IBorder on Windows #5008
    area/drawing ✏️
  • [shell] minor performance improvements #5013
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Fix iOS CollectionView update when not visible #5011
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Add a PropertyMapper for FormattedText #5029
  • Make sure RadioButtonExtensions.UpdateTextColor applies to RadioButton only #4998
    control-radiobutton

Updated

  • Fix Android crashing issue #4860
    platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, high
  • Fix template build to use correct slashes on all platforms #4991
    area/templates 📄
  • Remove Material Visual marker #4428
  • Remove Controls.Picker.TextTransform binding #4967
    area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [iOS] Update Editor scroll position #4850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Add pending events and dismiss keyboard button to EditorHandler #4345
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Implement pending focus management logic in Handlers #4914
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Loaded/Unloaded events and propagate Window #5027
  • Implement InputTransparent #4995
    area/controls 🎮
  • [X] Simplify OnPlatformExtension #4829
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Android] Implement custom WebChromeClient in WebViewHandler #4826
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen
  • Allow non-dot decimal separator in BindingExpression #5005
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/localization
  • [iOS] Update SearchBar TextColor property if TraitCollection changes #5004
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Update cursor visibility when IsReadOnly Property changes on Entry #5001
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add test coverage for migrations looking at the code generated in Up and Down methods #27564
  • Concurrency detection/exceptions and delete #27562
  • Projection of entity with nullable struct fails on ternary operator (efcore 6 braking change) #27561
  • Cosmos: Wrong validation on shadow property Partition key #27559

Closed

  • 'using' vs 'await using' usage while creating DbContext object #27560
  • Is there a sample for running ef migration bundles on linux agents? #27541
  • Performance issue when perform filtering using Where query in .NET 6 framework #27525
  • Cosmos tests are being skipped locally even when the emulator is running #27556

PullRequests

Created

  • Be consistent about using ConditionalFact and ConditionalTheory #27558

Updated

  • Stop wrapping single changes in transactions where possible #27500

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET Core SDK snap is not based on latest Ubuntu Core 20.04 (Focal) LTS: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.26' not found #13004
  • Installing the 6.0.2 ref pack MSI removes the 6.0.0 ref pack MSI #13237

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13317

Merged

  • Merge 6.0.200 into 6.0.3xx #13236
  • Merge pull request #12604 from dkurepa/ResolveComponentGovernance #13307
  • Merge pull request #12604 from dkurepa/ResolveComponentGovernance #13308
  • Save runtime commit to productCommit-rid.txt #13132
  • Rewrite smoke-tests.sh in new test framework based smoke tests #13286

Updated

  • Update 6.0.2xx with the current state of 1xx #13244
  • Update branding to 6.0.202 #13295
